channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell EMC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell EMC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-34456|2024-08-03T09:15:15.240Z -- dell%20emc -- metro%20node
item.description: Dell EMC Metro node, Version(s) prior to 7.1, contain a Code Injection Vulnerability. An authenticated nonprivileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the execution of arbitrary OS commands on the application.

item.title: CVE-2022-34442|2024-08-03T09:07:16.251Z -- dell%20emc -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%20policy%20manager
item.description: Dell EMC SCG Policy Manager, versions from 5.10 to 5.12, contain(s) a contain a Hard-coded Cryptographic Key vulnerability. Â An attacker with the knowledge of the hard-coded sensitive information, could potentially exploit this vulnerability to login to the system to gain LDAP user privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-34462|2024-08-03T09:15:15.135Z -- dell%20emc -- secure%20connect%20gateway%20%28scg%29%20policy%20manager
item.description: Dell EMC SCG Policy Manager, versions from 5.10 to 5.12, contain(s) a Hard-coded Password Vulnerability. An attacker, with the knowledge of the hard-coded credentials, could potentially exploit this vulnerability to login to the system to gain admin privileges.
